alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Tipton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 9:50PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Hamilton and southeastern Tipton Counties through 1030 PM EDT... At 950 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Tipton, or 20 miles south of Kokomo, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Tipton around 1005 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for central Indiana.
